# Delivery and Installation of a Spray Dryer

**Government Tender Announcement Reference Number**: #24-58066-Exp.QJRZ07576
**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Nature of Opportunity**: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Brief Overview
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking a supplier for the delivery and installation of a Spray Dryer to facilitate powder synthesis activities at its Mississauga-CEI site. The Spray Dryer is integral to the production of powder products and must meet the required specifications to ensure quality and safety.

## Supply Requirements

* Supply, delivery, and installation of the Spray Dryer
* Equipment must meet Safety Standard CAN/CSA Z142-M89
* Equipment must also meet International Organization for Standardization (ISO) 9001:2015 requirements
